post_text: October 23, 2014 at 7:52 AM#1Hi all,I've searched the forum and RTFM but I can't seem to figure out a macro that will let me select fixtures that are actively using a given preset.For example, I want to select all my fixtures that are using the "blue" color preset.Thank you in advance!
